story_19_02000/2401_1001_0100_10: It’s almost time. Lear should be arriving soon.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Well, well! Look who decided to show up.
I thought you’d get cold feet, but apparently
you have some guts after all.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What?! We’d never run away from a challenge!
You seriously underestimate us, Lear!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0500_10: Take it easy, Rosa. He’s just trying to rile us up.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Lear, battling is one thing, but threatening to
disqualify us because of your personal feelings is
wrong. Is that the kind of PML you want to run?
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Stop! I won’t hear it! You’re the ones who
tried my patience in the first place!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0800_10:
This is the end of the PML for you!
My...uh...Staraptor and I will make you
wish you’d never signed up to compete!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Uh-oh! Better watch out. Lear’s Staraptor is
waaay stronger than the Krookodile you fought
with Haxorus.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1000_10:
And what a sad Krookodile it was! To let that
battle end in a draw... I have no need for a
Pokémon too weak to follow my commands!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
The only Pokémon suitable for me is one that can
follow my commands without question and WIN!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
What?! How can you just throw away your
Pokémon like that... All because of a tie?!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Sync pairs are supposed to be partners!
Helping each other get through difficult defeats
is part of what makes us grow stronger!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Silence! How dare you judge my decisions! You
have no right to lecture me. Now prepare to fight!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: Young master... May I say something?
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] team may not
be perfect, but they were strong enough to
qualify for the finals, so be careful.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
We’ll toootally support you in this battle,
Master Lear. You can count on me ’n’ Sawyer—
story_19_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: Just who do you think you’re talking to right now?
story_19_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I never asked for your advice or your support!
I shall stomp these weaklings all by myself!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Is that understood?! Don’t let me hear you try to
advise me on this subject again!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Now, it’s time we start this.
Or end this, rather...
story_19_02000/2401_1001_2600_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
This isn’t the end of the PML for us.
There’s no way we’re giving up now.
story_19_02000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Sometimes battling is the only way to get people
to see eye to eye with you.
story_19_02000/2401_0401_2900_10:
Yeah! Let’s show Lear how strong our team’s
bond has become!
story_19_02000/2401_0402_3100_10:
Yeah! Let’s show Lear how strong our team’s
bond has become!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Ugh! Bonds... Teamwork... You still have the nerve
to speak about that nonsense in front of me?!
story_19_02000/2401_1001_3300_10:
Fine! I’ll show you once and for all how
ridiculous all of it really is!
